item.title: The Essentials to Successful User-Centric Development
item.description: Find out how you can deliver high-quality digital experiences across all touchpoints by putting users at the center of software development.

fields.text: However they choose to engage, consumers expect an experience they can rely on. This is more difficult than it seems, with 87% of consumers reporting that brands need to put more effort into providing consistent experiences across digital channels. Banner Health, a leader in U.S. healthcare, creates seamless digital experiences by putting its users at the center of software development. Find out how your business can capitalize on user-centric development.

item.title: 6 Secrets to Omnichannel and Digital Success
item.description: Find out how you can deliver the experiences your customers expect, no matter where interactions take place.

fields.text: Every industry has become a digital industry, meaning every company has to adapt its strategy for the modern consumer. It’s a task that is easier said than done and many brands are struggling with this transformation, failing to meet customers on their terms.

item.title: Solving the Problems of Voice Testing
item.description: Like smartphones did more than a decade ago, voice interfaces are changing the way consumers interact with brands. Find out how you can deliver seamless voice experiences for all users.

fields.text: Like smartphones did more than a decade ago, voice interfaces are changing the way consumers interact with brands. By 2022, 55% of U.S. households will have at least one smart speaker. Find out how you can deliver unique and seamless voice experiences that are relevant and functionally sound for users everywhere – regardless of location, language, dialect, or device.
